title: what to do when other lanes are losing and your winning mid
body: i keep losing game because of this. winning mid but bot lane feeding

replies.body: You roam and help them out.
1. run it down mid then afk{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}
thank you for the tip t1

play with me
what you need to do is roam bot tell the jungler to gank more or as fooxdrop put it sit on thier penis and also if they are getting camped tell them to hold the lane infront of the tower and behind the river

Back in season 2 (on NA), I tried ranked.

I won my lane every game (convincingly, like 7/1 during laning phase) and had rest of my team feed every game. Didn't even complete placements and have never been ranked, or tried ranked again since.

ARAM ftw.
Somehow, your story is hard to believe. If their laner feed you, and you complain that your team is feeding and that why you lost; Your full of shi-0t.
As a mid laner you are in perfect position to influence other roles on the map. Roam with your jungler to gank bot as well as secure other objectives such as RH and dragons.
